```
   414â†’    try {
   415â†’      const insertData = {
   416â†’        address_datum: formData.address_datum?.trim() || null,
   417â†’        street_number: formData.street_number?.trim() || null,
   418â†’        street_name: formData.street_name?.trim() || null,
   419â†’        apartment_unit: formData.apartment_unit?.trim() || null,
   420â†’        city: formData.city?.trim() || null,
   421â†’        state_code: formData.state_code?.trim() || null,
   422â†’        state_full: formData.state_full?.trim() || null,
   423â†’        zip_code: formData.zip_code?.trim() || null,
   424â†’        country_code: formData.country_code?.trim() || 'US',
   425â†’        country_full: formData.country_full?.trim() || 'United States',
   426â†’        latitude: formData.latitude || null,
   427â†’        longitude: formData.longitude || null,
   428â†’        address_notes: formData.address_notes?.trim() || null,
   429â†’        address_source: formData.address_source || 'manual',
   430â†’        is_primary: formData.is_primary,
   431â†’        is_verified: formData.is_verified,
   432â†’        user_internal_id: user.user_internal_id
   433â†’      };
   434â†’      
   435â†’      const { data: insertedData, error } = await supabase
   436â†’        .from('addresspren')
   437â†’        .insert([insertData])
   438â†’        .select()
   439â†’        .single();
   440â†’        
   441â†’      if (error) throw error;
   442â†’      
   443â†’      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
   444â†’      resetForm();
   445â†’      
   446â†’      // Add org entities structure
   447â†’      const addressWithEntities = {
   448â†’        ...insertedData,
   449â†’        org_entities: {
   450â†’          starred: false,
   451â†’          flagged: false,
   452â†’          circled: false,
   453â†’          squared: false,
   454â†’          triangled: false
   455â†’        }
   456â†’      };
   457â†’      
   458â†’      setData([addressWithEntities, ...data]);
   459â†’    } catch (err) {
   460â†’      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
   461â†’      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   462â†’    }
   463â†’  };
   464â†’

   539â†’  // Render cell content

   544â†’

   641â†’            `}

   646â†’          {Array.from({ length: Math.min(5, totalPages) }, (_, i) => {
   647â†’            let pageNum;
   648â†’            if (totalPages <= 5) {
   649â†’              pageNum = i + 1;
   650â†’            } else if (currentPage <= 3) {
   651â†’              pageNum = i + 1;
   652â†’            } else if (currentPage >= totalPages - 2) {
   653â†’              pageNum = totalPages - 4 + i;
   654â†’            } else {

   656â†’            }

   665â†’                  transition-colors duration-150 cursor-pointer
   666â†’                `}
   667â†’                style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   668â†’              >

   670â†’              </button>
   671â†’            );
   672â†’          })}
   673â†’          <button
   674â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(Math.min(totalPages, currentPage + 1))}
   675â†’            disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
   676â†’            className={`
   677â†’              px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium border border-gray-300 border-l-0 rounded-r-md

   688â†’  );
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

The /addressjar page has these component files:

1. **page.tsx** - Main page component that renders AddressjarClient
2. **pclient.tsx** - Main client component with authentication and layout 
3. **components/AddressprenTable.tsx** - Table component for managing address data

The page uses the "Address Constellation System" and includes:
- Authentication checks
- A data table with inline editing capabilities
- Organizational entity buttons (star, flag, circle, square, triangle)
- Search, pagination, and sorting functionality
- Create modals (both inline and popup)
- Integration with Supabase for data persistence

```
1â†’'use client';
     2â†’
     3â†’import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
     4â†’import { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
     5â†’import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
     6â†’
     7â†’interface OrgEntity {
     8â†’  entity_id?: number;
     9â†’  fk_url_id: number;
    10â†’  user_id: string;
    11â†’  is_starred: boolean;
    12â†’  is_flagged: boolean;
    13â†’  is_squared: boolean;
    14â†’  is_circled: boolean;
    15â†’  is_triangled: boolean;
    16â†’}
    17â†’
    18â†’export function useOrgEntities() {
    19â†’  const [orgEntities, setOrgEntities] = useState<{ [urlId: number]: OrgEntity }>({});
    20â†’  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    21â†’  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();
    22â†’  const { user } = useAuth();
    23â†’
    24â†’  // Fetch all org entities for current user
    25â†’  const fetchOrgEntities = async () => {
    26â†’    if (!user?.internalUserId) {
    27â†’      setLoading(false);
    28â†’      return;
    29â†’    }
    30â†’
    31â†’    try {
    32â†’      const { data, error } = await supabase
    33â†’        .from('redditurlsvat_org_entities')
    34â†’        .select('*')
    35â†’        .eq('user_id', user.internalUserId);
    36â†’
    37â†’      if (error) {
    38â†’        console.error('Error fetching org entities:', error);
    39â†’        return;
    40â†’      }
    41â†’
    42â†’      // Convert array to object keyed by url_id for quick lookup
    43â†’      const entitiesMap: { [urlId: number]: OrgEntity } = {};
    44â†’      data?.forEach(entity => {
    45â†’        entitiesMap[entity.fk_url_id] = entity;
    46â†’      });
    47â†’      
    48â†’      setOrgEntities(entitiesMap);
    49â†’    } catch (error) {
    50â†’      console.error('Error:', error);
    51â†’    } finally {
    52â†’      setLoading(false);
    53â†’    }
    54â†’  };
    55â†’
    56â†’  // Toggle a specific entity type for a URL
    57â†’  const toggleEntity = async (
    58â†’    urlId: number, 
    59â†’    entityType: 'is_starred' | 'is_flagged' | 'is_squared' | 'is_circled' | 'is_triangled'
    60â†’  ) => {
    61â†’    if (!user?.internalUserId) return;
    62â†’
    63â†’    const currentEntity = orgEntities[urlId];
    64â†’    const currentValue = currentEntity?.[entityType] || false;
    65â†’    const newValue = !currentValue;
    66â†’
    67â†’    try {
    68â†’      // Create the entity object with current values or defaults
    69â†’      const entityData: Partial<OrgEntity> = {
    70â†’        fk_url_id: urlId,
    71â†’        user_id: user.internalUserId,
    72â†’        is_starred: currentEntity?.is_starred || false,
    73â†’        is_flagged: currentEntity?.is_flagged || false,
    74â†’        is_squared: currentEntity?.is_squared || false,
    75â†’        is_circled: currentEntity?.is_circled || false,
    76â†’        is_triangled: currentEntity?.is_triangled || false,
    77â†’        [entityType]: newValue // Override the specific entity being toggled
    78â†’      };
    79â†’
    80â†’      const { data, error } = await supabase
    81â†’        .from('redditurlsvat_org_entities')
    82â†’        .upsert(entityData, {
    83â†’          onConflict: 'fk_url_id,user_id'
    84â†’        })
    85â†’        .select()
    86â†’        .single();
    87â†’
    88â†’      if (error) {
    89â†’        console.error('Error updating org entity:', error);
    90â†’        return;
    91â†’      }
    92â†’
    93â†’      // Update local state
    94â†’      setOrgEntities(prev => ({
    95â†’        ...prev,
    96â†’        [urlId]: data
    97â†’      }));
    98â†’
    99â†’    } catch (error) {
   100â†’      console.error('Error:', error);
   101â†’    }
   102â†’  };
   103â†’
   104â†’  // Check if a URL has a specific entity active
   105â†’  const hasEntity = (urlId: number, entityType: 'is_starred' | 'is_flagged' | 'is_squared' | 'is_circled' | 'is_triangled'): boolean => {
   106â†’    return orgEntities[urlId]?.[entityType] || false;
   107â†’  };
   108â†’
   109â†’  useEffect(() => {
   110â†’    fetchOrgEntities();
   111â†’  }, [user]);
   112â†’
   113â†’  return {
   114â†’    orgEntities,
   115â†’    loading,
   116â†’    toggleEntity,
   117â†’    hasEntity,
   118â†’    refetch: fetchOrgEntities
   119â†’  };
   120â†’}
```

```
    47â†’      
    48â†’      const response = await fetch('/api/reddit-scraper', {
    49â†’        method: 'POST',
    50â†’        headers: {
    51â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    52â†’        },
    53â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
    54â†’          selectedUrlIds: Array.from(selectedRows)
    55â†’        }),
    56â†’      });
    57â†’
    58â†’      if (!response.ok) {
    59â†’        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
    60â†’      }
    61â†’
    62â†’      const result = await response.json();
    63â†’      
    64â†’      // Show results summary
    65â†’      const successful = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success).length;
    66â†’      const totalLinks = result.results.reduce((sum: number, r: any) => sum + r.links_found, 0);
    67â†’      
    68â†’      alert(`Scraping completed!\n\nSuccessful: ${successful}/${result.results.length} URLs\nTotal links found: ${totalLinks}\n\nNote: Check browser console for detailed debug output.\nRefresh page manually to see updated table data.`);
    69â†’      
    70â†’      // Don't auto-refresh so user can see console debug output
    71â†’      // window.location.reload();
    72â†’      
    73â†’    } catch (error) {
    74â†’      console.error('Error scraping links:', error);
    75â†’      alert('Error occurred while scraping links: ' + (error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'));
    76â†’    } finally {
    77â†’      setIsScrapingLinks(false);
    78â†’    }
    79â†’  };
    80â†’
    81â†’  const handleScrapeCommentable = async () => {
    82â†’    if (selectedRows.size === 0) {
    83â†’      alert('Please select at least one Reddit URL to check commentability');
    84â†’      return;
    85â†’    }
    86â†’
    87â†’    setIsScrapingCommentable(true);
    88â†’    try {
    89â†’      console.log('ğŸš€ CLIENT: Checking commentability for selected rows:', Array.from(selectedRows));
    90â†’      
    91â†’      console.log('ğŸ“¡ CLIENT: Making API call to /api/reddit-commentable-scraper');
    92â†’      const response = await fetch('/api/reddit-commentable-scraper', {
    93â†’        method: 'POST',
    94â†’        headers: {
    95â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    96â†’        },
    97â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
    98â†’          selectedUrlIds: Array.from(selectedRows)
    99â†’        }),
   100â†’      });
   101â†’
   102â†’      console.log('ğŸ“¨ CLIENT: API response received:', {
   103â†’        status: response.status,
   104â†’        statusText: response.statusText,
   105â†’        ok: response.ok,
   106â†’        url: response.url
   107â†’      });
   108â†’
   109â†’      if (!response.ok) {
   110â†’        console.error('âŒ CLIENT: API response not ok:', response.status, response.statusText);
   111â†’        const errorText = await response.text();
   112â†’        console.error('âŒ CLIENT: Error response body:', errorText);
   113â†’        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
   114â†’      }
   115â†’
   116â†’      console.log('ğŸ”„ CLIENT: Parsing JSON response...');
   117â†’      const result = await response.json();
   118â†’      console.log('ğŸ“Š CLIENT: Parsed API result:', result);
   119â†’      
   120â†’      // Show results summary
   121â†’      const successful = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success).length;
   122â†’      const openThreads = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success && r.is_commentable === true).length;
   123â†’      const closedThreads = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success && r.is_commentable === false).length;
   124â†’      
   125â†’      alert(`Commentability check completed!\n\nSuccessful: ${successful}/${result.results.length} URLs\nOpen for comments: ${openThreads}\nClosed: ${closedThreads}\n\nNote: Check browser console for detailed debug output.\nRefresh page manually to see updated table data.`);
   126â†’      
   127â†’      // Don't auto-refresh so user can see console debug output
   128â†’      // window.location.reload();
   129â†’      
   130â†’    } catch (error) {
   131â†’      console.error('Error checking commentability:', error);
   132â†’      alert('Error occurred while checking commentability: ' + (error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'));
   133â†’    } finally {
   134â†’      setIsScrapingCommentable(false);
   135â†’    }
   136â†’  };
   137â†’
   138â†’  // FPopup1 URL parameter handling (same pattern as /nwjar1)
   139â†’  useEffect(() => {
   140â†’    // Handle URL parameters for popup and tab state
   141â†’    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
   142â†’    const fpop = urlParams.get('fpop');
   143â†’    const ptab1 = urlParams.get('ptab1');
   144â†’    const ptab2 = urlParams.get('ptab2');
   145â†’    const ptab3 = urlParams.get('ptab3');
   146â†’    const ptab4 = urlParams.get('ptab4');
   147â†’    const ptab5 = urlParams.get('ptab5');
   148â†’    const ptab6 = urlParams.get('ptab6');
   149â†’    const ptab7 = urlParams.get('ptab7');
   150â†’    
   151â†’    // Auto-open popup if fpop=open is in URL
   152â†’    if (fpop === 'open') {
   153â†’      setIsPopupOpen(true);
   154â†’      
   155â†’      // Set active tab based on URL parameters
   156â†’      if (ptab1 === 'active') {
   157â†’        setActivePopupTab('ptab1');
   158â†’      } else if (ptab2 === 'active') {
   159â†’        setActivePopupTab('ptab2');
   160â†’      } else if (ptab3 === 'active') {
   161â†’        setActivePopupTab('ptab3');
   162â†’      } else if (ptab4 === 'active') {
   163â†’        setActivePopupTab('ptab4');
   164â†’      } else if (ptab5 === 'active') {
   165â†’        setActivePopupTab('ptab5');
   166â†’      } else if (ptab6 === 'active') {
   167â†’        setActivePopupTab('ptab6');
   168â†’      } else if (ptab7 === 'active') {
   169â†’        setActivePopupTab('ptab7');
   170â†’      }
   171â†’    }
   172â†’  }, []);
   173â†’
   174â†’  // Fetch custom colors for uelbar37 and uelbar38
   175â†’  useEffect(() => {
   176â†’    const fetchUelBarColors = async () => {
   177â†’      try {
   178â†’        const { data, error } = await supabase
   179â†’          .from('custom_colors')
   180â†’          .select('color_ref_code, hex_value')
   181â†’          .in('color_ref_code', ['uelbar38_bgcolor1', 'uelbar38_textcolor1', 'uelbar37_bgcolor1', 'uelbar37_textcolor1']);
   182â†’
   183â†’        if (!error && data && data.length > 0) {
   184â†’          // uelbar38 colors
   185â†’          const bgColor38Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar38_bgcolor1');
   186â†’          const textColor38Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar38_textcolor1');
   187â†’          
   188â†’          const bgColor38 = bgColor38Item?.hex_value || '#2563eb';
   189â†’          const textColor38 = textColor38Item?.hex_value || '#ffffff';
   190â†’          
   191â†’          setUelBarColors({bg: bgColor38, text: textColor38});
   192â†’
   193â†’          // uelbar37 colors
   194â†’          const bgColor37Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar37_bgcolor1');
   195â†’          const textColor37Item = data.find(item => item.color_ref_code === 'uelbar37_textcolor1');
   196â†’          
   197â†’          const bgColor37 = bgColor37Item?.hex_value || '#1e40af';
   198â†’          const textColor37 = textColor37Item?.hex_value || '#ffffff';
   199â†’          
   200â†’          setUelBar37Colors({bg: bgColor37, text: textColor37});
   201â†’        }
   202â†’      } catch (err) {
   203â†’        console.error('Error fetching uel bar colors:', err);
   204â†’      }
   205â†’    };
   206â†’
   207â†’    fetchUelBarColors();
   208â†’  }, [supabase]);
   209â†’
   210â†’  // Track URL changes for uelbar37 display
   211â†’  useEffect(() => {
   212â†’    // Set initial URL
   213â†’    setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   214â†’    
   215â†’    // Listen for URL changes (for pushState/replaceState)
   216â†’    const handleUrlChange = () => {
   217â†’      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   218â†’    };
   219â†’    
   220â†’    // Listen for popstate events (back/forward buttons)
   221â†’    window.addEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   222â†’    
   223â†’    // Create a MutationObserver to watch for URL changes via pushState/replaceState
   224â†’    const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
   225â†’      if (window.location.href !== currentUrl) {
   226â†’        setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   227â†’      }
   228â†’    });
   229â†’    
   230â†’    // Watch for changes to the document that might indicate URL changes
   231â†’    observer.observe(document, { subtree: true, childList: true });
   232â†’    
   233â†’    // Custom event listener for our URL updates
   234â†’    const handleCustomUrlUpdate = () => {
   235â†’      setCurrentUrl(window.location.href);
   236â†’    };
   237â†’    window.addEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   238â†’    
   239â†’    return () => {
   240â†’      window.removeEventListener('popstate', handleUrlChange);
   241â†’      window.removeEventListener('urlchange', handleCustomUrlUpdate);
   242â†’      observer.disconnect();
   243â†’    };
   244â†’  }, [currentUrl]);
   245â†’
   246â†’  useEffect(() => {
   247â†’    if (!user) {
   248â†’      router.push('/login');
   249â†’      return;
   250â†’    }
   251â†’  }, [user, router]);
   252â†’
   253â†’  // FPopup1 handlers (same pattern as /nwjar1)
   254â†’  const handleKz101Click = () => {
   255â†’    setKz101Checked(true);
   256â†’    setKz103Checked(false);
   257â†’  };
   258â†’
   259â†’  const handleKz103Click = () => {
   260â†’    setKz103Checked(true);
   261â†’    setKz101Checked(false);
   262â†’  };
   263â†’
   264â†’  // Update URL parameters for popup state
   265â†’  const updatePopupURL = (fpopOpen: boolean, tabActive?: string) => {
   266â†’    const url = new URL(window.location.href);
   267â†’    
   268â†’    if (fpopOpen) {
   269â†’      url.searchParams.set('fpop', 'open');
   270â†’      
   271â†’      // Clear all tab parameters first
   272â†’      ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7'].forEach(tab => {
   273â†’        url.searchParams.delete(tab);
   274â†’      });
   275â†’      
   276â†’      // Set the active tab parameter
   277â†’      if (tabActive) {
   278â†’        url.searchParams.set(tabActive, 'active');
   279â†’      } else {
   280â†’        // Default to ptab1 if no specific tab provided
   281â†’        url.searchParams.set('ptab1', 'active');
   282â†’      }
   283â†’    } else {
   284â†’      // Remove popup and all tab parameters when popup is closed
   285â†’      url.searchParams.delete('fpop');
   286â†’      ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7'].forEach(tab => {
   287â†’        url.searchParams.delete(tab);
   288â†’      });
   289â†’    }
   290â†’    
   291â†’    // Update URL without triggering page reload
   292â†’    window.history.replaceState({}, '', url.toString());
   293â†’    
   294â†’    // Trigger custom event to update our URL display
   295â†’    window.dispatchEvent(new Event('urlchange'));
   296â†’  };
   297â†’
   298â†’  // Handle popup open/close with URL updates
   299â†’  const handlePopupOpen = () => {
   300â†’    setIsPopupOpen(true);
   301â†’    
   302â†’    // Set default selection if neither option is selected
   303â†’    if (!kz101Checked && !kz103Checked) {
   304â†’      setKz101Checked(true);
   305â†’    }
   306â†’    
   307â†’    // Check if URL has specific tab parameter
   308â†’    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
   309â†’    const hasTabInUrl = ['ptab1', 'ptab2', 'ptab3', 'ptab4', 'ptab5', 'ptab6', 'ptab7']
   310â†’      .some(tab => urlParams.get(tab) === 'active');
   311â†’    
   312â†’    if (!hasTabInUrl) {
   313â†’      // No tab specified in URL, use last remembered tab from localStorage
   314â†’      const lastTab = localStorage.getItem('reddjar_lastActiveTab') || 'ptab1';
   315â†’      setActivePopupTab(lastTab as any);
   316â†’      updatePopupURL(true, lastTab);
   317â†’    } else {
   318â†’      // URL has tab specified, use current activePopupTab
   319â†’      updatePopupURL(true, activePopupTab);
   320â†’    }
   321â†’  };
   322â†’
   323â†’  const handlePopupClose = () => {
   324â†’    setIsPopupOpen(false);
   325â†’    updatePopupURL(false);
   326â†’  };
   327â†’
   328â†’  // Handle tab changes with URL updates and localStorage
   329â†’  const handleTabChange = (tab: string) => {
   330â†’    setActivePopupTab(tab as any);
   331â†’    localStorage.setItem('reddjar_lastActiveTab', tab); // Remember this tab for next time
   332â†’    updatePopupURL(true, tab);
   333â†’  };
   334â†’
   335â†’  // Handle tags data from ReddjarTable
   336â†’  const handleTagsUpdate = (newTagsData: any) => {
   337â†’    setTagsData(newTagsData);
   338â†’  };
   339â†’
   340â†’  if (!user) {

   402â†’                  isScrapingCommentable || isScrapingLinks || selectedRows.size === 0
```

```
     5â†’export async function GET(request: NextRequest) {
     6â†’  try {
     7â†’    const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
     8â†’    const userInternalId = searchParams.get('user_internal_id');
     9â†’

    24â†’        { status: 401 }

    26â†’    }

    39â†’        { status: 500 }
```

```
1â†’import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
     2â†’import { createRouteHandlerClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
     3â†’import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
     4â†’
     5â†’export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
     6â†’  try {
     7â†’    const body = await request.json();
     8â†’    const { url_ids, tag_id, user_internal_id } = body;
     9â†’
    10â†’    if (!url_ids || !Array.isArray(url_ids) || url_ids.length === 0) {
    11â†’      return NextResponse.json(
    12â†’        { success: false, error: 'URL IDs array is required' },
    13â†’        { status: 400 }
    14â†’      );
    15â†’    }
    16â†’
    17â†’    if (!tag_id || !user_internal_id) {
    18â†’      return NextResponse.json(
    19â†’        { success: false, error: 'Tag ID and user internal ID are required' },
    20â†’        { status: 400 }
    21â†’      );
    22â†’    }
    23â†’
    24â†’    const supabase = createRouteHandlerClient({ cookies });
    25â†’
    26â†’    // Get current user session
    27â†’    const { data: { session }, error: sessionError } = await supabase.auth.getSession();
    28â†’    if (sessionError || !session) {
    29â†’      return NextResponse.json(
    30â†’        { success: false, error: 'Authentication required' },
    31â†’        { status: 401 }
    32â†’      );
    33â†’    }
    34â†’
    35â†’    // Verify the tag belongs to the user
    36â†’    const { data: tagData, error: tagError } = await supabase
    37â†’      .from('redditurlsvat_tags')
    38â†’      .select('tag_id')
    39â†’      .eq('tag_id', tag_id)
    40â†’      .eq('user_id', user_internal_id)
    41â†’      .single();
    42â†’
    43â†’    if (tagError || !tagData) {
    44â†’      return NextResponse.json(
    45â†’        { success: false, error: 'Tag not found or access denied' },
    46â†’        { status: 404 }
    47â†’      );
    48â†’    }
    49â†’
    50â†’    // Verify all URLs exist (Note: redditurlsvat doesn't have user-specific ownership like sitespren)
    51â†’    // We'll just verify the URLs exist in the system
    52â†’    const { data: urlsData, error: urlsError } = await supabase
    53â†’      .from('redditurlsvat')
    54â†’      .select('url_id')
    55â†’      .in('url_id', url_ids);
    56â†’
    57â†’    if (urlsError) {
    58â†’      return NextResponse.json(
    59â†’        { success: false, error: 'Error verifying URL existence' },
    60â†’        { status: 500 }
    61â†’      );
    62â†’    }
    63â†’
    64â†’    if (!urlsData || urlsData.length !== url_ids.length) {
    65â†’      return NextResponse.json(
    66â†’        { success: false, error: 'Some URLs not found' },
    67â†’        { status: 404 }
    68â†’      );
    69â†’    }
    70â†’
    71â†’    // Get existing relations to avoid duplicates
    72â†’    const { data: existingRelations, error: existingError } = await supabase
    73â†’      .from('redditurlsvat_tags_relations')
    74â†’      .select('fk_url_id')
    75â†’      .eq('fk_tag_id', tag_id)
    76â†’      .in('fk_url_id', url_ids);
    77â†’
    78â†’    if (existingError) {
    79â†’      console.error('Error checking existing relations:', existingError);
    80â†’      return NextResponse.json(
    81â†’        { success: false, error: 'Error checking existing relations' },
    82â†’        { status: 500 }
    83â†’      );
    84â†’    }
    85â†’
    86â†’    // Filter out URLs that already have this tag
    87â†’    const existingUrlIds = new Set(existingRelations?.map(r => r.fk_url_id) || []);
    88â†’    const newUrlIds = url_ids.filter(urlId => !existingUrlIds.has(urlId));
    89â†’
    90â†’    if (newUrlIds.length === 0) {
    91â†’      return NextResponse.json({
    92â†’        success: true,
    93â†’        message: 'All selected URLs are already tagged with this tag',
    94â†’        data: {
    95â†’          total_urls: url_ids.length,
    96â†’          new_relations: 0,
    97â†’          existing_relations: url_ids.length
    98â†’        }
    99â†’      });
   100â†’    }
   101â†’
   102â†’    // Create new relations
   103â†’    const relationsToInsert = newUrlIds.map((urlId, index) => ({
   104â†’      fk_url_id: urlId,
   105â†’      fk_tag_id: tag_id,
   106â†’      user_id: user_internal_id,
   107â†’      tag_position: index
   108â†’    }));
   109â†’
   110â†’    const { error: insertError } = await supabase
   111â†’      .from('redditurlsvat_tags_relations')
   112â†’      .insert(relationsToInsert);
   113â†’
   114â†’    if (insertError) {
   115â†’      console.error('Error inserting tag relations:', insertError);
   116â†’      return NextResponse.json(
   117â†’        { success: false, error: 'Failed to add URLs to tag' },
   118â†’        { status: 500 }
   119â†’      );
   120â†’    }
   121â†’
   122â†’    return NextResponse.json({
   123â†’      success: true,
   124â†’      message: `Successfully added ${newUrlIds.length} URL(s) to tag`,
   125â†’      data: {
   126â†’        total_urls: url_ids.length,
   127â†’        new_relations: newUrlIds.length,
   128â†’        existing_relations: existingUrlIds.size
   129â†’      }
   130â†’    });
   131â†’
   132â†’  } catch (error) {
   133â†’    console.error('Error in redditurlsvat_tags_relations POST:', error);
   134â†’    return NextResponse.json(
   135â†’      { success: false, error: 'Internal server error' },
   136â†’      { status: 500 }
   137â†’    );
   138â†’  }
   139â†’}
   140â†’
   141â†’export async function DELETE(request: NextRequest) {
   142â†’  try {
   143â†’    const body = await request.json();
   144â†’    const { url_ids, tag_id, user_internal_id } = body;
   145â†’
   146â†’    if (!user_internal_id) {
   147â†’      return NextResponse.json(
   148â†’        { success: false, error: 'User internal ID is required' },
   149â†’        { status: 400 }
   150â†’      );
   151â†’    }
   152â†’
   153â†’    const supabase = createRouteHandlerClient({ cookies });
   154â†’
   155â†’    // Get current user session
   156â†’    const { data: { session }, error: sessionError } = await supabase.auth.getSession();
   157â†’    if (sessionError || !session) {
   158â†’      return NextResponse.json(
   159â†’        { success: false, error: 'Authentication required' },
   160â†’        { status: 401 }
   161â†’      );
   162â†’    }
   163â†’
   164â†’    let query = supabase
   165â†’      .from('redditurlsvat_tags_relations')
   166â†’      .delete()
   167â†’      .eq('user_id', user_internal_id);
   168â†’
   169â†’    // If specific tag_id provided, filter by it
   170â†’    if (tag_id) {
   171â†’      query = query.eq('fk_tag_id', tag_id);
   172â†’    }
   173â†’
   174â†’    // If specific url_ids provided, filter by them
   175â†’    if (url_ids && Array.isArray(url_ids) && url_ids.length > 0) {
   176â†’      query = query.in('fk_url_id', url_ids);
   177â†’    }
   178â†’
   179â†’    const { error } = await query;
   180â†’
   181â†’    if (error) {
   182â†’      console.error('Error deleting tag relations:', error);
   183â†’      return NextResponse.json(
   184â†’        { success: false, error: 'Failed to remove URLs from tag' },
   185â†’        { status: 500 }
   186â†’      );
   187â†’    }
   188â†’
   189â†’    return NextResponse.json({
   190â†’      success: true,
   191â†’      message: 'Successfully removed URLs from tag'
   192â†’    });
   193â†’
   194â†’  } catch (error) {
   195â†’    console.error('Error in redditurlsvat_tags_relations DELETE:', error);
   196â†’    return NextResponse.json(
   197â†’      { success: false, error: 'Internal server error' },
   198â†’      { status: 500 }
   199â†’    );
   200â†’  }
   201â†’}
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Based on my examination of the /reddjar page and database structure, here are the component files and database patterns:

## /reddjar Component Files:
- **page.tsx** - Main page component
- **pclient.tsx** - Client component with popup functionality
- **components/ReddjarTable.tsx** - Main data table component
- **hooks/useOrgEntities.ts** - Hook for organizational entities management

## Database Tables Structure Pattern:

**Main table: `redditurlsvat`** (equivalent to your planned `addressglub`)

**Supporting tables:**
1. **`redditurlsvat_org_entities`** - User-specific organizational markers
   - Fields: `entity_id`, `fk_url_id`, `user_id`, `is_starred`, `is_flagged`, `is_squared`, `is_circled`, `is_triangled`

2. **`redditurlsvat_tags`** - User-specific tags
   - Fields: `tag_id`, `tag_name`, `tag_order`, `user_id`, `created_at`, `updated_at`

3. **`redditurlsvat_tags_relations`** - Many-to-many relationship between URLs and tags
   - Fields: `fk_url_id`, `fk_tag_id`, `user_id`, `tag_position`

This pattern would map to your planned tables as:
- `addressglub` (main global table)
- `addresspren` (user-specific address records)
- `addresspren_org_entities` (organizational markers)
- `addresspren_tags` (user tags)
- `addresspren_tags_relations` (tag relationships)

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Based on the /reddjar pattern and your exact field specifications, here are the SQL table definitions:

```sql
-- Main global address table
CREATE TABLE addressglub (
    addressglub_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    street_1 TEXT NOT NULL,
    street_2 TEXT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state_code VARCHAR(10) NULL,
    state_full VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    zip_code VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    country_code VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'USA',
    country VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'United States',
    street_1_clean TEXT NULL,
    full_address_formatted TEXT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL(10,8) NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(11,8) NULL,
    is_validated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    validation_source VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    validation_accuracy VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    plus_four VARCHAR(4) NULL,
    fk_city_id INTEGER NULL,
    fk_address_species_id INTEGER NULL,
    usage_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    quality_score INTEGER NULL,
    confidence_level DECIMAL(3,2) NULL,
    is_business BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    is_residential BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    is_po_box BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    is_apartment BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    is_suite BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    data_source VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    source_reference VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
    address_hash VARCHAR(64) NULL
);

-- User-specific address records
CREATE TABLE addresspren (
    addresspren_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    address_label VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    fk_addressglub_id INTEGER NULL,
    street_1_override TEXT NULL,
    street_2_override TEXT NULL,
    city_override VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    state_code_override VARCHAR(10) NULL,
    state_full_override VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    zip_code_override VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    country_override VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    internal_notes TEXT NULL,
    address_purpose VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    is_primary BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    is_favorite BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    last_used_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NULL,
    usage_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    sharing_permissions JSONB NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- User organizational entities for addresspren
CREATE TABLE addresspren_org_entities (
    entity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    fk_addresspren_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    starred BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    flagged BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    circled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    squared BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    triangled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- User tags for addresspren
CREATE TABLE addresspren_tags (
    tag_id UUID DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    tag_color VARCHAR(7) NULL,
    tag_description TEXT NULL,
    tag_order INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Many-to-many relationships between addresspren and tags
CREATE TABLE addresspren_tags_relations (
    relation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    fk_addresspren_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    fk_tag_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    tag_position INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL
);
```

This follows the exact pattern from /reddjar but uses your specified field names from the addressglub and addresspren schemas.

```sql
-- Command 1: Create addressglub table
CREATE TABLE addressglub (
    addressglub_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    street_1 TEXT NOT NULL,
    street_2 TEXT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state_code VARCHAR(10) NULL,

    quality_score INTEGER NULL,

    is_residential BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,

    is_apartment BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,

    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
    address_hash VARCHAR(64) NULL
);
```

```sql
-- Command 2: Create addresspren table
CREATE TABLE addresspren (
    addresspren_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id),
    address_label VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    fk_addressglub_id INTEGER REFERENCES addressglub(addressglub_id),
    street_1_override TEXT NULL,
    street_2_override TEXT NULL,
    city_override VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    state_code_override VARCHAR(10) NULL,
    state_full_override VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    zip_code_override VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    country_override VARCHAR(100) NULL,
    internal_notes TEXT NULL,
    address_purpose VARCHAR(255) NULL,
    is_primary BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    is_favorite BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    last_used_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NULL,
    usage_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    sharing_permissions JSONB NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

```sql
-- Command 3: Create addresspren_org_entities table
CREATE TABLE addresspren_org_entities (
    entity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    fk_addresspren_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES addresspren(addresspren_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id),
    starred BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    flagged BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    circled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    squared BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    triangled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
    UNIQUE(fk_addresspren_id, user_id)
);
```

```sql
-- Command 4: Create addresspren_tags table
CREATE TABLE addresspren_tags (
    tag_id UUID DEFAULT gen_random_uuid() PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    tag_color VARCHAR(7) NULL,
    tag_description TEXT NULL,
    tag_order INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id),
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

```sql
-- Command 5: Create addresspren_tags_relations table
CREATE TABLE addresspren_tags_relations (
    relation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    fk_addresspren_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES addresspren(addresspren_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    fk_tag_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES addresspren_tags(tag_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id),
    tag_position INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
    UNIQUE(fk_addresspren_id, fk_tag_id, user_id)
);
```

5 commands total - copy and paste each block separately.

```sql
CREATE INDEX idx_addressglub_created_at ON addressglub(created_at);
CREATE INDEX idx_addressglub_is_validated ON addressglub(is_validated);
CREATE INDEX idx_addressglub_validation_source ON addressglub(validation_source);
```

```sql

CREATE INDEX idx_addresspren_tags_relations_user_id ON addresspren_tags_relations(user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_addresspren_tags_relations_tag_position ON addresspren_tags_relations(tag_position);
```

```sql
-- Command 6: Create updated_at triggers
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    NEW.updated_at = NOW();
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

CREATE TRIGGER update_addressglub_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON addressglub FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_addresspren_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON addresspren FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_addresspren_org_entities_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON addresspren_org_entities FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_addresspren_tags_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON addresspren_tags FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
```

6 commands total - the indexes, triggers, and function for automatic updated_at timestamps.

```tsx
  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);

    { key: 'internal_notes' as keyof AddressData, label: 'internal_notes', type: 'text', width: '200px', group: 'addresspren' },
    { key: 'address_purpose' as keyof AddressData, label: 'address_purpose', type: 'text', width: '150px', group: 'addresspren' },
    { key: 'is_primary' as keyof AddressData, label: 'is_primary', type: 'boolean', width: '100px', group: 'addresspren' },

    { key: 'addresspren_created_at' as keyof AddressData, label: 'created_at', type: 'datetime', readOnly: true, width: '160px', group: 'addresspren', separator: 'right' },
    
    // addressglub columns
    { key: 'addressglub_id' as keyof AddressData, label: 'addressglub_id', type: 'number', readOnly: true, width: '120px', group: 'addressglub' },

    { key: 'validation_source' as keyof AddressData, label: 'validation_source', type: 'text', readOnly: true, width: '150px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'validation_accuracy' as keyof AddressData, label: 'validation_accuracy', type: 'text', readOnly: true, width: '150px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'plus_four' as keyof AddressData, label: 'plus_four', type: 'text', readOnly: true, width: '100px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'fk_city_id' as keyof AddressData, label: 'fk_city_id', type: 'number', readOnly: true, width: '100px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'fk_address_species_id' as keyof AddressData, label: 'fk_address_species_id', type: 'number', readOnly: true, width: '180px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'addressglub_usage_count' as keyof AddressData, label: 'usage_count', type: 'number', readOnly: true, width: '120px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'quality_score' as keyof AddressData, label: 'quality_score', type: 'number', readOnly: true, width: '120px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'confidence_level' as keyof AddressData, label: 'confidence_level', type: 'number', readOnly: true, width: '140px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'is_business' as keyof AddressData, label: 'is_business', type: 'boolean', readOnly: true, width: '100px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'is_residential' as keyof AddressData, label: 'is_residential', type: 'boolean', readOnly: true, width: '120px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'is_po_box' as keyof AddressData, label: 'is_po_box', type: 'boolean', readOnly: true, width: '100px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'is_apartment' as keyof AddressData, label: 'is_apartment', type: 'boolean', readOnly: true, width: '120px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'is_suite' as keyof AddressData, label: 'is_suite', type: 'boolean', readOnly: true, width: '100px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'data_source' as keyof AddressData, label: 'data_source', type: 'text', readOnly: true, width: '120px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'source_reference' as keyof AddressData, label: 'source_reference', type: 'text', readOnly: true, width: '180px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'addressglub_created_at' as keyof AddressData, label: 'created_at', type: 'datetime', readOnly: true, width: '160px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'addressglub_updated_at' as keyof AddressData, label: 'updated_at', type: 'datetime', readOnly: true, width: '160px', group: 'addressglub' },
    { key: 'address_hash' as keyof AddressData, label: 'address_hash', type: 'text', readOnly: true, width: '200px', group: 'addressglub' }
  ];

  // Fetch data from Supabase
  const fetchData = async () => {
    if (!user?.id) return;

    try {
      setLoading(true);
      
      const { data: addressData, error } = await supabase
        .from('addresspren')
        .select(`
          *,
          addressglub:fk_addressglub_id (*)
        `)
        .eq('user_id', user.id)
        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });

      if (error) throw error;
      
      // Flatten the joined data
      const transformedData = addressData?.map(addr => ({
        // addresspren fields
        addresspren_id: addr.addresspren_id,
        user_id: addr.user_id,
        address_label: addr.address_label,
        fk_addressglub_id: addr.fk_addressglub_id,
        street_1_override: addr.street_1_override,
        street_2_override: addr.street_2_override,
        city_override: addr.city_override,
        state_code_override: addr.state_code_override,
        state_full_override: addr.state_full_override,
        zip_code_override: addr.zip_code_override,
        country_override: addr.country_override,
        internal_notes: addr.internal_notes,
        address_purpose: addr.address_purpose,
        is_primary: addr.is_primary,
        is_active: addr.is_active,
        is_favorite: addr.is_favorite,
        last_used_at: addr.last_used_at,
        usage_count: addr.usage_count,
        sharing_permissions: addr.sharing_permissions,
        addresspren_created_at: addr.created_at,
        addresspren_updated_at: addr.updated_at,
        
        // addressglub fields
        addressglub_id: addr.addressglub?.addressglub_id || null,
        street_1: addr.addressglub?.street_1 || null,
        street_2: addr.addressglub?.street_2 || null,
        city: addr.addressglub?.city || null,
        state_code: addr.addressglub?.state_code || null,
        state_full: addr.addressglub?.state_full || null,
        zip_code: addr.addressglub?.zip_code || null,
        country_code: addr.addressglub?.country_code || null,
        country: addr.addressglub?.country || null,
        street_1_clean: addr.addressglub?.street_1_clean || null,
        full_address_formatted: addr.addressglub?.full_address_formatted || null,
        latitude: addr.addressglub?.latitude || null,
        longitude: addr.addressglub?.longitude || null,
        is_validated: addr.addressglub?.is_validated || null,
        validation_source: addr.addressglub?.validation_source || null,
        validation_accuracy: addr.addressglub?.validation_accuracy || null,
        plus_four: addr.addressglub?.plus_four || null,
        fk_city_id: addr.addressglub?.fk_city_id || null,
        fk_address_species_id: addr.addressglub?.fk_address_species_id || null,
        addressglub_usage_count: addr.addressglub?.usage_count || null,
        quality_score: addr.addressglub?.quality_score || null,
        confidence_level: addr.addressglub?.confidence_level || null,
        is_business: addr.addressglub?.is_business || null,
        is_residential: addr.addressglub?.is_residential || null,
        is_po_box: addr.addressglub?.is_po_box || null,
        is_apartment: addr.addressglub?.is_apartment || null,
        is_suite: addr.addressglub?.is_suite || null,
        data_source: addr.addressglub?.data_source || null,
        source_reference: addr.addressglub?.source_reference || null,
        addressglub_created_at: addr.addressglub?.created_at || null,
        addressglub_updated_at: addr.addressglub?.updated_at || null,
        address_hash: addr.addressglub?.address_hash || null
      })) || [];

      setData(transformedData);
      
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error fetching data:', err);
      setError(err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Unknown error');
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchData();
  }, [user]);

  // Filter and sort data
  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = data;
    
    if (searchTerm) {
      filtered = data.filter(item => 
        Object.values(item).some(value => 
          value && value.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
        )
      );
    }

    return filtered.sort((a, b) => {
      const aValue = a[sortField];
      const bValue = b[sortField];
      
      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      
      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      return 0;
    });
  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);

  // Pagination
  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage));
  const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage);
  const paginatedData = itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData : filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, startIndex + itemsPerPage);

  // Handle sorting
  const handleSort = (field: keyof AddressData) => {
    if (sortField === field) {
      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
    } else {
      setSortField(field);
      setSortOrder('asc');
    }
  };

  // Handle cell editing
  const handleCellClick = (id: number, field: string, value: any) => {
    const column = columns.find(col => col.key === field);
    if (column?.readOnly || column?.type === 'boolean') return;
    
    setEditingCell({ id, field });
    setEditingValue(value?.toString() || '');
  };

  const handleCellSave = async () => {
    if (!editingCell) return;

    try {
      let processedValue: any = editingValue;

      // Process value based on type
      const column = columns.find(col => col.key === editingCell.field);
      if (column?.type === 'number') {
        processedValue = editingValue === '' ? null : Number(editingValue);
      } else if (column?.type === 'datetime') {
        processedValue = editingValue === '' ? null : editingValue;
      } else {
        processedValue = editingValue === '' ? null : editingValue;
      }

      const { error } = await supabase
        .from('addresspren')
        .update({ [editingCell.field]: processedValue })
        .eq('addresspren_id', editingCell.id);

      if (error) throw error;

      // Update local data
      setData(data.map(item => 
        item.addresspren_id === editingCell.id 
          ? { ...item, [editingCell.field]: processedValue }
          : item
      ));

      setEditingCell(null);
      setEditingValue('');
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error updating cell:', err);
      alert('Failed to update cell');
    }
  };

  const handleCellCancel = () => {
    setEditingCell(null);
    setEditingValue('');
  };

  // Handle boolean toggle
  const handleBooleanToggle = async (id: number, field: keyof AddressData, currentValue: boolean | null) => {
    const newValue = currentValue === null ? true : !currentValue;
    
    try {
      const { error } = await supabase
        .from('addresspren')
        .update({ [field]: newValue })
        .eq('addresspren_id', id);

      if (error) throw error;

      // Update local data
      setData(data.map(item => 
        item.addresspren_id === id ? { ...item, [field]: newValue } : item
      ));
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error toggling boolean:', err);
      alert('Failed to update field');
    }
  };

  // Create new record inline
  const createNewRecordInline = async () => {
    if (!user?.id) return;

    try {
      const newRecord = {
        user_id: user.id,
        address_label: 'New Address',
        fk_addressglub_id: null,
        street_1_override: '',
        street_2_override: '',
        city_override: '',
        state_code_override: '',
        state_full_override: '',
        zip_code_override: '',
        country_override: '',
        internal_notes: '',
        address_purpose: '',
        is_primary: false,
        is_active: true,
        is_favorite: false,
        usage_count: 0
      };

      const { data: insertedData, error } = await supabase
        .from('addresspren')
        .insert([newRecord])
        .select()
        .single();

      if (error) throw error;

      // Create full address data object for display
      const newAddressData: AddressData = {
        addresspren_id: insertedData.addresspren_id,
        user_id: insertedData.user_id,
        address_label: insertedData.address_label,
        fk_addressglub_id: insertedData.fk_addressglub_id,
        street_1_override: insertedData.street_1_override,
        street_2_override: insertedData.street_2_override,
        city_override: insertedData.city_override,

        address_purpose: insertedData.address_purpose,
        is_primary: insertedData.is_primary,
        is_active: insertedData.is_active,
        is_favorite: insertedData.is_favorite,
        last_used_at: insertedData.last_used_at,
        usage_count: insertedData.usage_count,
        sharing_permissions: insertedData.sharing_permissions,
        addresspren_created_at: insertedData.created_at,
        addresspren_updated_at: insertedData.updated_at,
        
        // addressglub fields (all null for new record)
        addressglub_id: null,
        street_1: null,
        street_2: null,
        city: null,
        state_code: null,
        state_full: null,
        zip_code: null,
        country_code: null,
        country: null,
        street_1_clean: null,
        full_address_formatted: null,
        latitude: null,
        longitude: null,
        is_validated: null,
        validation_source: null,
        validation_accuracy: null,
        plus_four: null,
        fk_city_id: null,
        fk_address_species_id: null,
        addressglub_usage_count: null,
        quality_score: null,
        confidence_level: null,
        is_business: null,
        is_residential: null,
        is_po_box: null,
        is_apartment: null,
        is_suite: null,
        data_source: null,
        source_reference: null,
        addressglub_created_at: null,
        addressglub_updated_at: null,
        address_hash: null
      };

      // Add to local data at the beginning
      setData([newAddressData, ...data]);
      
      // Set first editable cell to editing mode
      setEditingCell({ id: insertedData.addresspren_id, field: 'address_label' });
      setEditingValue('New Address');
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
      alert('Failed to create record');
    }
  };

  // Handle popup form submission
  const handleCreateSubmit = async () => {
    if (!user?.id) return;

    try {
      const insertData = {
        user_id: user.id,
        address_label: formData.address_label?.trim() || null,
        fk_addressglub_id: formData.fk_addressglub_id,
        street_1_override: formData.street_1_override?.trim() || null,
        street_2_override: formData.street_2_override?.trim() || null,
        city_override: formData.city_override?.trim() || null,
        state_code_override: formData.state_code_override?.trim() || null,
        state_full_override: formData.state_full_override?.trim() || null,
        zip_code_override: formData.zip_code_override?.trim() || null,
        country_override: formData.country_override?.trim() || null,
        internal_notes: formData.internal_notes?.trim() || null,
        address_purpose: formData.address_purpose?.trim() || null,
        is_primary: formData.is_primary,
        is_active: formData.is_active,
        is_favorite: formData.is_favorite,
        usage_count: 0
      };
      
      const { data: insertedData, error } = await supabase
        .from('addresspren')
        .insert([insertData])
        .select()
        .single();
        
      if (error) throw error;
      
      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
      resetForm();
      
      // Refresh data to show new record
      fetchData();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
    }
  };

  // Reset form
  const resetForm = () => {
    setFormData({
      address_label: '',
      fk_addressglub_id: null,
      street_1_override: '',
      street_2_override: '',
      city_override: '',
      state_code_override: '',
      state_full_override: '',
      zip_code_override: '',
      country_override: '',
      internal_notes: '',
      address_purpose: '',
      is_primary: false,
      is_active: true,
      is_favorite: false
    });
  };

  // Render cell content
  const renderCell = (item: AddressData, column: typeof columns[0]) => {
    const value = item[column.key];
    const isEditing = editingCell?.id === item.addresspren_id && editingCell?.field === column.key;
    const isReadOnly = column.readOnly;

    if (column.type === 'boolean' && !isReadOnly) {
      return (
        <button
          onClick={() => handleBooleanToggle(item.addresspren_id, column.key, value as boolean | null)}
          className={`w-12 h-6 rounded-full transition-colors ${
            value === true ? 'bg-green-500' : 
            value === false ? 'bg-gray-300' : 'bg-yellow-300'
          }`}
        >
          <div className={`w-5 h-5 bg-white rounded-full transition-transform ${
            value === true ? 'translate-x-6' : 
            value === false ? 'translate-x-1' : 'translate-x-3'
          }`} />
        </button>
      );
    }

    if (column.type === 'boolean' && isReadOnly) {
      return (
        <div className={`w-12 h-6 rounded-full ${
          value === true ? 'bg-green-500' : 
          value === false ? 'bg-gray-300' : 'bg-yellow-300'
        }`}>
          <div className={`w-5 h-5 bg-white rounded-full ${
            value === true ? 'translate-x-6' : 
            value === false ? 'translate-x-1' : 'translate-x-3'
          }`} />
        </div>
      );
    }

    if (isEditing) {
      return (
        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
          <input
            type={column.type === 'number' ? 'number' : 'text'}
            value={editingValue}
            onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
            onKeyPress={(e) => {
              if (e.key === 'Enter') handleCellSave();
              if (e.key === 'Escape') handleCellCancel();
            }}
            className="w-full px-2 py-1 border border-blue-500 rounded focus:outline-none"
            autoFocus
          />
          <button onClick={handleCellSave} className="text-green-600 hover:text-green-800">
            âœ“
          </button>
          <button onClick={handleCellCancel} className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-800">
            âœ—
          </button>
        </div>
      );
    }

    return (
      <div
        onClick={() => !isReadOnly && handleCellClick(item.addresspren_id, column.key, value)}
        className={`px-2 py-1 ${!isReadOnly ? 'cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100' : 'cursor-default'} truncate`}
        title={value?.toString() || ''}
      >
        {column.type === 'datetime' && value ? 
          new Date(value).toLocaleString() : 
          value?.toString() || ''
        }
      </div>
    );
  };

  // Pagination Controls Component
  const PaginationControls = () => (
    <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
      {/* Items per page */}
      <div className="flex items-center">
        <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Per page:</span>
        <div className="inline-flex" role="group">
          {[10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500, -1].map((value, index) => (
            <button
              key={value}
              onClick={() => {
                setItemsPerPage(value === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : value);
                setCurrentPage(1);
              }}
              className={`
                px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium border border-gray-300
                ${itemsPerPage === (value === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : value) ? 'bg-green-600 text-white border-green-600' : 'bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100'}
                ${index === 0 ? 'rounded-l-md' : ''}
                ${index === 6 ? 'rounded-r-md' : ''}
                ${index > 0 ? 'border-l-0' : ''}
                transition-colors duration-150 cursor-pointer
              `}
              style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
            >
              {value === -1 ? 'All' : value}
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Page navigation */}
      <div className="flex items-center">
        <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Page:</span>
        <div className="inline-flex" role="group">
          <button
            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(Math.max(1, currentPage - 1))}
            disabled={currentPage === 1}
            className={`
              px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium border border-gray-300 rounded-l-md
              ${currentPage === 1 ? 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' : 'bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer'}
              transition-colors duration-150
            `}
            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
          >
            â†
          </button>
          {Array.from({ length: Math.min(5, totalPages) }, (_, i) => {
            let pageNum;
            if (totalPages <= 5) {
              pageNum = i + 1;
            } else if (currentPage <= 3) {
              pageNum = i + 1;
            } else if (currentPage >= totalPages - 2) {
              pageNum = totalPages - 4 + i;
            } else {
              pageNum = currentPage - 2 + i;
            }
            
            return (
              <button
                key={pageNum}
                onClick={() => setCurrentPage(pageNum)}
                className={`
                  px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium border border-gray-300 border-l-0
                  ${currentPage === pageNum ? 'bg-green-600 text-white border-green-600' : 'bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100'}
                  transition-colors duration-150 cursor-pointer
                `}
                style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
              >
                {pageNum}
              </button>
            );
          })}
          <button
            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(Math.min(totalPages, currentPage + 1))}
            disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
            className={`
              px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium border border-gray-300 border-l-0 rounded-r-md
              ${currentPage === totalPages ? 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' : 'bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer'}

            â†’
          </button>
        </div>

    </div>
  );

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading addresses...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {

        <div className="text-red-500">{error}</div>
      </div>
    );

    <div className="w-full">
      {/* Top Header Area */}
      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-2 border-t-0">

              {startIndex + 1}-{Math.min(startIndex + (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage), filteredAndSortedData.length)} of {filteredAndSortedData.length} addresses

                onClick={() => {
                  setSearchTerm('');
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}

              >

              <tr>
                <th className="px-2 py-3 text-left border border-gray-200" style={{ width: '50px' }}>
                  <div 
                    className="w-full h-full flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer"
                    onClick={() => {
                      if (selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length && paginatedData.length > 0) {
                        setSelectedRows(new Set());
                      } else {
                        setSelectedRows(new Set(paginatedData.map(item => item.addresspren_id)));
                      }

                      type="checkbox"
                      style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}

                      onChange={() => {}} // Handled by div onClick
                    />
                  </div>
                </th>
                {columns.map((column) => (
                  <th
                    key={column.key}

                      column.separator === 'right' ? 'border-r-4 border-r-blue-500' : ''

                    style={column.width ? {

                      maxWidth: column.width,

                        <span className="text-xs">

                        if (newSelected.has(item.addresspren_id)) {

                        } else {
                          newSelected.add(item.addresspren_id);
                        }
                        setSelectedRows(newSelected);

                        type="checkbox"
                        style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                        checked={selectedRows.has(item.addresspren_id)}
                        onChange={() => {}} // Handled by div onClick
                      />

                      key={column.key}

                    className="w-4 h-4 text-blue-600 rounded border-gray-300 focus:ring-blue-500"
                  />
                  <label htmlFor="is_active" className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
                    Active
                  </label>
                </div>
                
                <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
                  <input
                    type="checkbox"
                    id="is_favorite"
                    checked={formData.is_favorite}
                    onChange={(e) => setFormData({ ...formData, is_favorite: e.target.checked })}
                    className="w-4 h-4 text-blue-600 rounded border-gray-300 focus:ring-blue-500"
                  />

                    Favorite
                  </label>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <div className="mt-6 flex justify-end space-x-3">
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
                  resetForm();
                }}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-gray-700 bg-gray-200 rounded hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors"
              >
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={handleCreateSubmit}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors"
              >
                Create Address
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

- âœ… **Immediate display**: New records appear instantly with full join data

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Looking at your CSS selector, I can see the issue. The CSS selector has a typo:

```css
table.utg_addressjar > tr.shenfur_db_table_name_th > th.for_db_field_addresspren_addresspren_id
```

The problem is `shenfur_db_table_name_th` should be `shenfur_db_table_name_tr` (tr not th).

Also, the selector structure isn't quite right for the HTML structure. The correct selector should be:

```css
table.utg_addressjar thead tr.shenfur_db_table_name_tr th.for_db_field_addresspren_addresspren_id {
  background-color: #000;
}
```

Or more simply:

```css
tr.shenfur_db_table_name_tr th.for_db_field_addresspren_addresspren_id {
  background-color: #000;
}
```

The HTML structure is:
```html
<table class="utg_addressjar">
  <thead>
    <tr class="shenfur_db_table_name_tr">  <!-- Note: _tr not _th -->
      <th class="for_db_field_addresspren_addresspren_id">
```

So the issue is the typo in the class name (`th` instead of `tr`) in your CSS selector.

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Perfect! I've successfully implemented both requirements:

## **âœ… Added 3px Black Vertical Separator:**
- Added `separator: 'right'` to the `fk_addressglub_id` column definition
- Updated all table cells to render a 3px black right border when `column.separator === 'right'`
- Applied to both header rows and data rows

## **âœ… Created WolfExclusionBand System:**

### **Sticky Columns (WolfExclusionBand):**
- `checkbox` (always present)
- `addresspren_id`
- `address_label` 
- `fk_addressglub_id` (with 3px black separator)

### **Column Pagination Logic:**
1. **WolfExclusionBand columns** are always visible on the left
2. **Paginated columns** are filtered from the remaining columns (excluding WolfExclusionBand)
3. **Column pagination controls** now only affect the columns to the right of the WolfExclusionBand
4. **Final visible columns** = WolfExclusionBand + current page of paginated columns

## **Result:**
- The first 4 columns (checkbox + 3 addresspren fields) are always visible
- The 3px black separator clearly divides the sticky area from the paginated area
- Column pagination controls only page through the remaining columns
- Users maintain context with key identifying fields while browsing other data

The WolfExclusionBand provides a stable reference point while allowing flexible pagination of the extensive addressglub and remaining addresspren fields.

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Perfect! I've successfully enabled inline editing for addressglub fields. Here's what I've done:

## **âœ… Made Key Addressglub Fields Editable:**

**Removed `readOnly: true` from these text fields:**
- `street_1`
- `street_2` 
- `city`
- `state_code`
- `state_full`
- `zip_code`
- `country_code`
- `country`
- `plus_four`
- `data_source`
- `source_reference`

## **âœ… Updated Database Update Logic:**

### **Cell Save Handler (`handleCellSave`):**
- **Detects column group** (`addresspren` vs `addressglub`)
- **Routes updates appropriately**:
  - `addressglub` fields â†’ Updates `addressglub` table using `addressglub_id`
  - `addresspren` fields â†’ Updates `addresspren` table using `addresspren_id`

### **Boolean Toggle Handler (`handleBooleanToggle`):**
- **Same routing logic** for boolean fields
- **Supports both tables** for future boolean fields

## **âœ… Kept Read-Only Fields:**
- **IDs and system fields** (addressglub_id, created_at, updated_at)
- **Calculated fields** (street_1_clean, full_address_formatted, address_hash)
- **Geographic data** (latitude, longitude)
- **Validation metadata** (is_validated, validation_source, etc.)
- **Foreign keys** (fk_city_id, fk_address_species_id)

## **Result:**
Now users can click and inline-edit the core address fields in the addressglub section just like they can with addresspren fields. The system automatically determines which database table to update based on the column's group property.

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Here are step-by-step instructions to check RLS (Row Level Security) in Supabase:

## **ğŸ“‹ How to Check RLS in Supabase:**

### **1. Access Your Supabase Dashboard:**
- Go to [supabase.com](https://supabase.com)
- Sign in and select your project

### **2. Navigate to Authentication & Authorization:**
- In the left sidebar, click **"Authentication"**
- Then click **"Policies"** (or **"Row Level Security"**)

### **3. Check Table Policies:**
- Look for your tables: **`addressglub`** and **`addresspren`**
- Each table should show:
  - âœ… **RLS Enabled** (green checkmark) OR
  - âŒ **RLS Disabled** (red X)

### **4. Check Existing Policies:**
For each table, you should see policies like:
- `Enable read access for authenticated users`
- `Enable insert access for authenticated users`  
- `Enable update access for authenticated users`
- `Enable delete access for authenticated users`

### **5. If No Policies Exist, Create Them:**

Click **"New Policy"** for each table and create:

#### **For `addressglub` table:**
```sql
-- Allow SELECT
CREATE POLICY "Enable read access for all users" ON "public"."addressglub"
AS PERMISSIVE FOR SELECT
TO public
USING (true);

-- Allow INSERT  
CREATE POLICY "Enable insert for authenticated users" ON "public"."addressglub"
AS PERMISSIVE FOR INSERT
TO authenticated
WITH CHECK (true);

-- Allow UPDATE
CREATE POLICY "Enable update for authenticated users" ON "public"."addressglub"
AS PERMISSIVE FOR UPDATE
TO authenticated
USING (true)
WITH CHECK (true);
```

#### **For `addresspren` table:**
```sql
-- Allow SELECT (user's own records)
CREATE POLICY "Users can view own addresspren" ON "public"."addresspren"
AS PERMISSIVE FOR SELECT
TO authenticated
USING (auth.uid() = user_id);

-- Allow INSERT (user's own records)
CREATE POLICY "Users can insert own addresspren" ON "public"."addresspren"
AS PERMISSIVE FOR INSERT
TO authenticated
WITH CHECK (auth.uid() = user_id);

-- Allow UPDATE (user's own records)
CREATE POLICY "Users can update own addresspren" ON "public"."addresspren"
AS PERMISSIVE FOR UPDATE
TO authenticated
USING (auth.uid() = user_id)
WITH CHECK (auth.uid() = user_id);
```

### **6. Alternative: Quick Fix (Disable RLS Temporarily):**
If you want to test quickly, you can temporarily disable RLS:
- Find your table in the policies list
- Click the **"Disable RLS"** button
- âš ï¸ **Warning:** This removes all security - only for testing!

### **7. Check User Authentication:**
- Go to **"Authentication"** â†’ **"Users"**  
- Make sure your user account exists and has a valid `user_id` (UUID)

Let me know what you see in the RLS policies section!
